name: Glow-verload
description:
Controls -------------

A and D - Movement

Space - Jump

Mouse - Point and Click to Fire

-----------------------------------------------------------

Glow-verload was made for Mini Jam 100, with the theme of OVERLOAD, and the limitation of CHAOS IS EVERYTHING!

Roll around and blast enemies in this platformy, bullet-helly wing-dang-doodle!

Are you feeling glow-verloaded yet?
